My name is

Ian Scott

It's nice to meet you.

My brother Austin built me this website with his own two hands so that I may show off my amateur photography, videography, and writing skills. I'm so grateful to have a cheap easy to use website in place and I was able to do it in such a quick timeframe.

Get in touch!
